00037 #define VALIDATE_ARGUMENTS(condition)                   VALIDATE(condition, eSTATUS_COMMON_INVALID_ARGUMENT)

00050 #define CLEAR_ARRAY(var, size)                                  SAFE_OPERATION(memset(var, 0, sizeof(var[0]) * ARRAY_SIZE(size)))

00074 #define CHECK(rc)                                                               SAFE_OPERATION(if ((s_lastStatus = rc) != eSTATUS_COMMON_OK) return (s_lastStatus))
00075 
00079 #define NCHECK(rc)                                                              SAFE_OPERATION(if ((rc) == eSTATUS_COMMON_OK) return (eSTATUS_COMMON_OK))

00084 #define CHECK_STATUS_BREAK(rc)                                  {if ((rc) != eSTATUS_COMMON_OK) break;}

00092 #define GET_MEMBER(destination, ptr, member)    SAFE_OPERATION(VALIDATE_ARGUMENTS(ptr && destination); *destination = ptr->member; return eSTATUS_COMMON_OK;)

00100 #define SET_MEMBER(source, ptr, member)                 SAFE_OPERATION(VALIDATE_ARGUMENTS(ptr); ptr->member = source; return eSTATUS_COMMON_OK;)

00108 #define CONSTRUCT(pptr, module, ...)                    SAFE_OPERATION ( \
00109                                                                                                         VALIDATE_ARGUMENTS(pptr); \
00110                                                                                                         *pptr = NEW(module); \
00111                                                                                                         VALIDATE(*pptr, eSTATUS_COMMON_NO_MEMORY); \
00112                                                                                                         return module ## Init (*pptr, ## __VA_ARGS__); \
00113                                                                                                 )
00114 
00119 #define DESTRUCT(pptr, module)                                  SAFE_OPERATION( \
00120                                                                                                         VALIDATE_ARGUMENTS(pptr && *pptr); \
00121                                                                                                         CHECK(module ## Destroy(*pptr)); \
00122                                                                                                         DELETE(*pptr); \
00123                                                                                                         return eSTATUS_COMMON_OK; \
00124                                                                                                 )
